name: :memo: cleanup
description: Changelog | This PR primarily removes deprecated functionality

name: :memo: deprecation
description: Changelog | This PR introduces a new deprecation

name: :memo: security
description: Changelog | This PR addresses a security vulnerability

name: :memo: feat
description: Changelog | This PR introduces a new feature

name: :memo: chore
description: Changelog | This PR primarily refactors code or updates dependencies

name: :memo: perf
description: Changelog | This PR improves performance in a notable way

name: :memo: test
description: Changelog | This PR primarily adds tests for a feature

name: :memo: bugfix
description: Changelog | This PR primarily fixes a reported issue

name: :memo: doc
description: Changelog | This PR adds/improves/or fixes documentation

name: :memo: infra
description: Add Infra changelog entry | PRs related to build/release/ci infra

name: :memo: skip
description: Changelog | This PR SHOULD NOT be included in the changelog

name: :dart: release
description: PR Should be Backported to the Release Branch Once Accepted
